name: Stamping
description:
This was my first game! I built this while teaching myself Unity over the course of five days. It is very simple, and has almost no textures, but it sets out to do one specific thing, and it does exactly that. Critics might call it "The DOOM (2016) of stamping," if critics called it anything.

I have made bigger and more complex games since I made this one, but this still holds a special place in my heart.
